content:
Thanks everyone for the great event!
Have the days been fixed already for next years European installation?
On the printed program, it says Amsterdam Nov 20-22, 2019 (& June 10-12 in Redmond, WA)

I've been saving the last stroopwafels for when I find the time to watch the DevDays videos. My wife noticed that the best before date of the stroopwafels is today, so tonight's the night!
2019-01-18-20.45.58.jpg
